summary:
My career started as a Treasury Consultant providing advice to corporate, governmental and financial institutions on various topics in the field of treasury and asset management with the focus on front and middle office before taking this knowledge into IT where I have been a Business Consultant providing quality Business Analysis since 2000.

With this perspective of both Business and IT, and good interpersonal and client facing skills, I make an effective interface between the Business Users, Systems Analysts & Developers and Management – understanding the whole project lifecycle and helping to translate requirements into developments and to test the results.

For more than ten years, I have worked on large software implementation and upgrade projects in the field of Treasury, Asset Management and Central Banking and consulting process change and change management in various locations in the world.

Specialties: 
• Front, Middle, Back office and Accounting experience from perspective of Business and IT
• Wallstreet Suite (ION), Wall Street Systems (WSS, Trema Suite or Finance KIT)
• Simcorp Dimension
• IR Instruments (Bonds, Loans, CP, Repo and Collateral) and IR Derivatives (IRS, CCIRS, FRA, CDS)
• FX instruments and FX Derivatives
• Equity and Equity Derivatives
• Credit Risk Management, Risk Management and Value at Risk
• SWIFT and settlements
• Market Data (Reuters, Bloomberg)
• Accounting & Reconciliation
